name: Stormworks: Build and Rescue
description: Join a world where you design, create and pilot your own air sea rescue service. Release your inner hero as you battle fierce storms out at sea to rescue those in need.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i5 4th Generation Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Geforce 550 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i7 6th Generation Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 750 / Radeon R7 360 Storage: 500 MB available space
